mapper.select: select * from rcm_noticedecision_info i where i.businessid = #{businessId}
select * from rcm_noticedecision_info i where i.projectformalId = #{projectformalId}
mapper.update: update rcm_noticedecision_info set wf_state=#{wf_state} where businessid=#{businessId}

update rcm_noticedecision_info set contractScale = trunc(to_number(#{contractScale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),4), evaluationScale = trunc(to_number(#{evaluationScale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),4), reviewOfTotalInvestment = trunc(to_number(#{reviewOfTotalInvestment}),4), decisionStage = #{decisionStage}, dateOfMeeting = to_date(#{dateOfMeeting,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), consentToInvestment = #{consentToInvestment}, reportingUnitId = #{reportingUnitId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_update_date = to_date(#{last_update_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), responsibilityUnitValue = #{responsibilityUnitValue}, oldData = #{oldData,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where businessId = #{businessId}
mapper.insert: insert into rcm_noticedecision_info ninfo ( businessid, contractscale, evaluationscale, reviewoftotalinvestment, decisionstage, responsibilityunitvalue, wf_state, apply_date, last_update_date, projectformalid, reportingunitid, dateOfMeeting, consenttoinvestment , create_date, createBy, oldData ) values ( #{businessId}, trunc(to_number(#{contractScale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),4), trunc(to_number(#{evaluationScale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),4), trunc(to_number(#{reviewOfTotalInvestment}),4), #{decisionStage}, #{responsibilityUnitValue}, #{wf_State}, to_date(#{appyly_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), to_date(#{last_update_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #{projectFormalid}, #{reportingUnitId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, to_date(#{dateOfMeeting,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #{consentToInvestment}, to_date(#{create_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') , #{createBy}, #{oldData,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update rcm_formalAssessment_info set stage=#{stage} where businessid in (#{businessId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select ta.*, (select min(url_) from (select pp.business_key_, to_char('#/NoticeOfDecision/view/'||pp.business_key_ || '@'||x.proc_def_id_ ||'@'||x.proc_inst_id_||'@'||x.id_ ) url_ from act_hi_taskinst x, act_hi_procinst pp, act_re_procdef a where x.proc_inst_id_ = pp.proc_inst_id_ and pp.proc_def_id_ = a.id_ and a.key_='noticeOfDecision' ) gg where gg.business_key_=ta.businessid group by gg.business_key_ ) detailurl from ( select ndinfo.businessid as businessid, ( select org.name from sys_org org where org.ORGPKVALUE = ( select pinfo.pertainareaid from rcm_formalassessment_info pinfo where pinfo.businessid = ndinfo.projectformalid ) ) as pertainareaName, ( select pinfo.projectname from rcm_formalassessment_info pinfo where pinfo.businessid = ndinfo.projectformalid ) as projectName , ( select pinfo.isUrgent from rcm_formalassessment_info pinfo where pinfo.businessid = ndinfo.projectformalid ) as isUrgent , to_char(ndinfo.DATEOFMEETING,'yyyy-mm-dd') as dateOfMeeting, to_char(ndinfo.DATEOFMEETING,'yyyy-mm-dd') as dateOfMeeting1, to_char(ndinfo.apply_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') as apply_dates , decode(ndinfo.wf_state,'0','起草中','1','审批中','2','已审批','3','终止') as approve_state, ndinfo.consenttoinvestment, ndinfo.wf_state, ndinfo.createBy,ndinfo.olddata, ndinfo.create_date from rcm_noticedecision_info ndinfo ) ta where 1 = 1 and ta.wf_state in ('1','2') and ta.createby=#{createBy} and ta.projectName like '%${projectName}%' and ta.consentToInvestment = '${consentToInvestment}' and ta.approve_state = '${approveState}' and ta.dateOfMeeting1 = '${dateOfMeeting}' order by ${orderBy}
mapper.update: update rcm_noticedecision_info set CONSENTTOINVESTMENT=#{decisionResult} where projectformalId = #{projectformalId}
